name: Werebear

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The werebear makes two attacks, using Handaxe or Rend in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Handaxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Rend (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The werebear shape-shifts into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or Large bear, or returns to humanoid form. Statistics other than size are the same.

description: Werebears shape-shift from humanoid forms into mighty bears or hybrids. They protect the wilds and aid Fey, druids, or spirits of the wilderness.

name: Wereboar

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wereboar makes two attacks, using Javelin or Tusk in any combination. It can replace one with a Gore attack.

actions.name: Gore (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. Humanoid targets: DC 12 CON save or cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tusk (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. Charge bonus: extra 7 (2d6) and Prone.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The wereboar shape-shifts into a Medium boar-humanoid hybrid or Small boar, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Wereboars shape-shift from humanoid forms into powerful boars or humanoid-boar hybrids.

name: Wererat

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The wererat makes two attacks, using Scratch or Hand Crossbow. It can replace one with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage. DC 11 CON save or cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The wererat shape-shifts into a Medium rat-humanoid hybrid or Small rat, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Wererats shape-shift from humanoid forms into giant rats or humanoid-rat hybrids.

name: Weretiger

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The weretiger makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow. It can replace one with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. DC 13 CON save or cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Prowl (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
bonusActions.description: The weretiger moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end, it can take the Hide action.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The weretiger shape-shifts into a Large tiger-humanoid hybrid or Large tiger, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Weretigers shape-shift from humanoid forms into tigers or tiger-humanoid hybrids.

name: Werewolf

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.description: The werewolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one ally is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The werewolf makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow. It can replace one with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. DC 12 CON save or cursed with lycanthropy.

actions.name: Scratch
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 150/600 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.description: The werewolf shape-shifts into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid or Medium wolf, or returns to humanoid form.

description: Werewolves change from humanoid forms into fierce wolves or wolf-humanoid hybrids.

name: Dust Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: The mephit explodes when it dies. DC 10 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Blinding Breath
actions.description: DC 10 DEX save in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: Blinded until end of mephit's next turn.

description: Dust mephits are composed of air and fine earth, drawn to forsaken places.

name: Ice Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 10 CON save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Cold damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Breath
actions.description: DC 10 CON save in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 7 (3d4) Cold damage. Success: Half.

description: Ice mephits have bodies of frigid air and frozen water.

name: Magma Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 11 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: DC 11 DEX save in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half.

description: Magma mephits embody the merging of earth and fire as glowing magma.

name: Steam Mephit

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.description: Attack rolls against the mephit are made with Disadvantage unless it has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.description: DC 10 DEX save in 5-foot Emanation. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage. Success: Half.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Slashing plus 2 (1d4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.description: DC 10 CON save in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage, Speed -10 ft. Success: Half damage only. Underwater doesn't grant Resistance.

description: Steam mephits are arrogant beings made of heat and vaporous water.

name: Intellect Devourer
languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Detect Intelligence
traits.description: The intellect devourer senses any creature within 300 feet with INT 3+, regardless of barriers.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The intellect devourer makes one Claw attack and uses Devour Intellect.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Devour Intellect
actions.description: DC 12 INT save, one creature within 5 feet. Failure: 11 (2d10) Psychic damage, Stunned until end of next turn.

actions.name: Steal Body
actions.description: DC 12 INT save, one Incapacitated Humanoid/Beast within 5 feet with 10 HP or fewer. Failure: The intellect devourer possesses the target, consuming its brain and teleporting inside its skull.

description: Intellect devourers serve mind flayer creators by consuming brains and puppetizing mindless bodies.

name: Mind Flayer

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mind flayer has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) Psychic damage. Medium or smaller: Grappled (DC 14) and Stunned.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.description: DC 15 CON save, one creature Grappled by Tentacles. Failure: 55 (10d10) Piercing damage. Success: Half. If reduced to 0 HP, brain devoured.

actions.name: Mind Blast
actions.description: DC 15 INT save in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: 31 (6d8 + 4) Psychic damage, Stunned until end of next turn. Success: Half only.

description: A mind flayer's hunger for brains is outmeasured only by its thirst for dominance.

name: Mind Flayer Arcanist

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mind flayer makes three Arcane Tentacles attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Tentacles
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft or range 120 ft. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) Psychic damage, and can teleport target 30 ft. If reduced to 0 HP, brain devoured.

actions.name: Mind Burst
actions.description: DC 17 INT save in 40-foot Emanation. Failure: 41 (8d8 + 5) Psychic damage, Stunned. Success: Half only.

reactions.name: Shield (2/Day)
reactions.description: Casts Shield in response to that spell's trigger.

description: Mind flayer arcanists enhance psionic abilities with magic. Other mind flayers view them with disgust and fear.

name: Arcanaloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the arcanaloth dies outside Gehenna, it gains a new body instantly there.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Tome
traits.description: The arcanaloth has a magic tome (AC 17, HP 35, immune to Necrotic/Poison/Psychic). While holding it, can use Banishing Claw. Regains all HP each turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Three Fiendish Burst attacks. Can replace one with Banishing Claw.

actions.name: Fiendish Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft or range 120 ft. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Banishing Claw (Requires Soul Tome)
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) Slashing plus 19 (3d12) Psychic. DC 17 CHA save or trapped in Soul Tome demiplane.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: Teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Counterspell
reactions.description: Casts Counterspell in response to that spell's trigger.

description: Arcanaloths bend their intellects toward hoarding and exploiting secrets.

name: Mezzoloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the mezzoloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Two attacks, using Claws or Mercurial Trident in any combination.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage. Large or smaller: Grappled (DC 14) and Restrained.

actions.name: Mercurial Trident
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. Returns magically after ranged attack.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: Teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space. Can bring one grappled creature.

description: Insectile yugoloths that seek power and souls in service of fiendish lords.

name: Nycaloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the nycaloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Two Mercurial Axe attacks.

actions.name: Mercurial Axe
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft or range 30/90 ft. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing plus 10 (3d6) Force damage. Returns magically.

bonusActions.name: Shadowy Teleport
bonusActions.description: Invisible for 1 minute, teleports up to 30 feet. Invisibility ends after dealing damage.

description: Fiendish warmongers that relish combat and conquest, teleporting around battlefields with shifting axes.

name: Ultroloth

traits.name: Fiendish Restoration
traits.description: If the ultroloth dies outside Gehenna, it revives there instantly.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Uses Hypnotic Gaze and makes two Mercurial Whip attacks.

actions.name: Mercurial Whip
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) Force damage, can teleport target 10 ft.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.description: DC 17 WIS save in 30-foot Cone. Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, Stunned. Success: Immune for 24 hours.

bonusActions.name: Fiendish Guile
bonusActions.description: Casts Dispel Magic, Invisibility (self), Misty Step, or Suggestion.

description: Ultroloths manipulate mortals and yugoloths alike, seeking to hoard power and spread suffering.
